channel.title: [317 delta] Update countdown
channel.description:
sorry if this is the wrong section
would someone be able to help me with adding a update countdown for example:
when you type command ::update
it starts a countdown which all players on the server can see
any help would be great
thanks

item.title: [317 delta] Update countdown
item.dc:creator: @MoreWeed MoreWeed
item.description:
@MoreWeed wrote:

oh yeah >.<

Thanks =p works now

Read full topic

item.title: [317 delta] Update countdown
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

MoreWeed:

nope =/ just makes the client disconnect the you call the command…

You are typing in a number with the command right? Example:

::update 60

60 is the seconds for the countdown. If you don’t enter a number after the initial command in-game, then it will disconnect you.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 delta] Update countdown
item.dc:creator: @MoreWeed MoreWeed
item.description:
@MoreWeed wrote:

nope =/ just makes the client disconnect the you call the command, had to change it though to fix errors, heres what i had to put, could this be why?

if (command.startsWith("update") && playerRights > 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

Read full topic

} if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("your username")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
heres a snippet of what it look like try it, i suppose

Its already in Delta… and it counts in seconds so ::update 120 would show up as 2:00…
[/quote]

He means the one like runescape, when it’s at the corner of the screen.[/quote]
Thats the one like in Runescape… It’s already in Delta
